Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckingAccount, SavingsAccount

    public class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    BankAccount.java: This class is a simple model of a general banking account, to be used for understanding inheritance.
    Author:
    From the book "Big Java" by Cay Horstmann
